hard_constraints.description: For any instance where the Ryzen5 processor is selected, it is strictly required that the associated motherboard is the B450 model; the selection of any motherboard M such that M is not equal to 'B450' is prohibited.

It is mandated that the selection of the i5 processor implies the exclusive assignment of the Z390 motherboard; all configurations containing the i5 CPU and a motherboard M such that M is not 'Z390' are excluded from the solution space.
A mutual exclusivity constraint is imposed upon the RX580 graphics processing unit and the Z390 motherboard; the conjunction of these two components within a single configuration is disallowed.
